name: EZKey Keyboard Visualization
tagline: A C#.NET/WPF application for live streamers of real time strategy games to visualize their keyboard usage - Works with a single monitor and OBS
body:
EZKey Keyboard Visualization
============================

### Work in progess
This is currently about as alpha as it gets. There are lots of awesome features to come and the program still has lots of problems. Here's a list of what's coming in the future:

* Additional keys: Space, Alt/Ctrl, Shift, Caps Lock, Tab etc.
* Customization: customizable colors (foreground, background, text), size, space between keys, round edges, keyboard layout
* Labeled keys (Customizable color, font, size etc.)
* Many things I cannot think of at the moment

This page is also work in progress, btw. I will put a detailed explaination about how to set it up and usde it here once I'm actually done coding it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
